Header.title: Software Developer
Header.paragraph: My name is Muhammad Usman Hussian and I am Full Stack Developer.

About.paragraph: An exceptionally creative individual with in-depth knowledge of programming languages and development tools, possessing good interpersonal and analytical skills. Ability to adhere to design and develop software applications and thrive and learn on my own or collaboratively with a team under little or no supervision, with 2+ years of working experience on diverse web, mobile, and cloud technologies like ASP.NET Core, React Native, JavaScript, AWS, and GCP. Seeking the role of a Software Engineer in a leading organization to incorporate my expertise in application design, development, and deployments.
